Description: Sherd of lip and body of Fikellura style pottery Ionian cup; outside, eight-petalled rosette on body, black paint on lip; inside black.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 50, no. 8)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.164)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: II.8 (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
